Question: This person persuaded Coltrane to play with the group on one final European tour in the spring of 1960.
Hints: This person was then arrested and taken to jail where he was charged with feloniously assaulting an officer.
Miles Dewey **** III (May 26, 1926 – September 28, 1991) was an American jazz musician, trumpeter, bandleader, and composer.
You're Under Arrest was this person' final album for Columbia.
